text: Lua Maria Blanco (born March 5, 1987) is a Brazilian actress and singer. She began her career in 2008 in a participation in the telenovela Três Irmãs, in 2009 she acted in Young Hearts, she gained fame in 2011 by playing one of the six protagonists of the telenovela Rebelde Brasil. Lua dated Arthur Aguiar. Blanco was born in São Paulo. == Filmography == Films & TV Year Title Role Notes 2008 Três Irmãs Luana Episode: "September 15" 2009 Young Hearts Julia Ribeiro (Joe) Season 16 TV Globinho Presenter 2010 Aventuras do Didi Grace 2011 Teus Olhos Meus Taila Movie 2011–2012 Rebelde Brasil Roberta Messi 2012 Rebeldes para Sempre Herself Documental 2013 Pecado Mortal Silvia de Almeida 2016 Turbulência Paula Movie 2017 A Força do Querer Anita 2018 Popstar Herself Contestant 2019 Socorro, Virei Uma Garota!
